title: Riot Fix Your Loading Screen.
body:
Hey Rioters/League Players, So I have been queueing for the past month and have been getting Low Prio because my game disconnects me during the loading screen when im at 100% or I just crash as soon as I get into the loading screen. I keep on getting low prio so i get a bit _tilted_ If there is anyway to fix please hmu with that quality help. This just has me clapping like brand...
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 
And if this has anything to do with my pc I will be befuddled bc i just got a new Alienware.
-TPG

replies.body:
I checked and wasn't able to find any records of issues with the loading screen. Most players experience issues during the loading screen because of an *unstable connection* to our servers. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will take you through network configuration changes that usually resolve the issues, so I highly recommend giving it a go!

If you have further issues with this, let me know.
